oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ceremonial fraternal sword with scabbard
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. John W. Armstrong, Co. B, 6th Tenn. Inf., USA from Strawberry Plains, Tenn. Armstrong enlisted in April 18, 1862 in Kentucky. He was court martialed in September 1862 and sentenced to forfeit two months pay. He was reported as sick in a Murfreesboro, Tenn. hospital in April, 1863. He appears to have remained with the regiment until late in the war.
